branch.commit: Initial Commit for the new repository.
Minor alteration Change how Static value is returned by getData
Updated fully to the new vcs and to the new repository.
A new code parser created to contain generic functions.
Dependencies bug fixed.
Developer query updated to load information from index xml.
Initial working commit.
Code cleaned from unwanted echos.
Getting to the new repository.
Unwanted css removed.
Php safe code removed.
Bug fixed.
New bug fixed.
Updated again to the new repository. Multiple bug fixes.
Load module css and js from the new repositiory.
Path bug fixed.
Multiple bugs fixed in loading module's css and js.
Updated to export modules from the new repository.
Css Editor update Updated Css Editor previewer. Changed toggle preview / model logic. Replaced toggle button with two separate buttons.

Presentation and functionality updated. Module View bug fixed when loading and loosing old inner modules. UI Presentation updated, toolbar with new domain navigation protocol and tabControl tab resize (partially working with some visual obstacles). ModuleProtocol updated for weblink actions to work only as weblinks when ctrl or meta key is pressed.
Updated to resize only updated tabControl.
Bug Fix Fixed a bug that was storing wrong data about the state of a page, static or not
Bug Fixes Multiple minor bug fixes, regarding bad jq selectors
Updated to resize only full tabbers on content modified.
Redirections on action weblinks are permitted with ctrl or meta key press now.
dvbDomain updated to parse mapping file for sql queries.
Creating new queries for developer project management. dvbDomain updated to create query indexing. dvbQuery updated to create index before create the query.
tabControl sync functions updated. tabControl updated to have the edited anchor (*) in front of the tab name in order to be visible.
HTMLContent objects updated to extend HTMLContent object. ModulePageTemplate class is deprecated. We can use directly HTMLModulePage which extends HTMLContent.

Module, Module Group, Module Views and SQL name resolving completed. Javascript objects created in order to search and replace hashed names of the above objects. You must declare to the objects the containers to search to.
Activity logger updated to get today's logs.
Toolbar and ribbon functionality updates.
Activity logger bug fixed in creating log file. Repository overviewer structure updated.
Export function in dvbLib fixed to get queries correctly.
Javascript bugs fixed in multiple ESS and API classes.
Logger updates. UI and API logger updated to work correctly. API logger updated to use priority (logger::DEBUG by default). ServerReport updated to set readable time to log headers.
Logger logs. Classes updated to use logger properly, including log type for statistics.
UI functions added to HTMLContent. A function for getting a weblink added. It will be moved to the UIFactory as soon as new items arrive.
Logger updates.
Javascript code updated and debug logs removed.
Dependency bug fixes.
File references for headers updated.

Export resource files function updated to create index file with names and hash tags. Package files are cleared and will be cleared if content is empty from now on. This prevents old and deleted code to exist in the internal published site.
Building HTMLContent and HTMLModulePage can load external html content. Extra functions added to get parent's name and resolve to get html file name.
Clear navigation toolbar items updated. Toolbar menu items will be cleared in every HTMLModulePage load.
Module Protocol converted to use json reports. Other classes updated to match the protocol update.
HTMLServerReport updated to extend JSONServerReport.
Bug fixes.
Updates to classes and debugging mostly. A new sql query created, for getting folders in a given domain.
Bug fixes in new Json Module Protocol.

Protocols updated. BootLoader added a function for loading resources form the header. FormProtocol added the listeners for submited and reset events. ModuleProtocol uses BootLoader to parse the headers for resources.
Bug in ascop async request fixed. Requests for json data now.
Popup parent testing.
Final commit Form Protocol. Updating handler functions.
Hoping final commit.
Triggered actions updated to prevent conflicts.
ModuleProtocol new function for calling module from javascript.
SQL Queries for module user groups added.
BootLoader protocol updated to keep partial track of resources loaded. Related classes also updated to identify resources.
HTML Class created for extending DOM with html-specific functions.
Logger update for entire system. A new type of context added ("log"). We use this type to determine context with special handling.
Bug in dependency circle fixed.
Debugging...
Constants added in HTMLServerReport for content type. Debugging Module Protocol.

commit.author: add7ceac8d79c8004ff281e2fd1a01ef3
commit.summary: Module Protocol updated to trigger actions to document.
commit.description: Because sender may be not there when the action is triggered, the action will be triggered to the document too. Later, it will be triggered only on the document. Later, we can add a holder to trigger the action (as a css selector) and by default will be the 'html' object.
